name: 4th Edition of World Aquaculture and Fisheries Conference
content: You are cordially invited to the "4th Edition of the World Aquaculture and Fisheries Conference" (WAC 2024) organized by Magnus Group. This prestigious conference will be held from June 24th to June 26th, 2024, in the enchanting city of Paris, France. Aquaculture Congress offers a unique hybrid event experience, allowing participants to join either in-person or online. Bringing together professionals, researchers, scientists, industry representatives, and enthusiasts from across the globe, Aquaculture Conference aims to explore the theme of "Panoramic View of Innovations That Impact Life Below Water." This exciting event provides a platform to delve into the latest advancements and discoveries in the field of aquaculture and fisheries. By attending Fisheries Congress, you will have the opportunity to engage in enlightening discussions, gain valuable insights from keynote presentations by renowned experts, and participate in informative sessions and workshops. Aquaculture Conference program features a diverse range of topics, covering various aspects of aquaculture and fisheries, including innovative technologies, sustainability, conservation, and human resource management. Don't miss this exceptional opportunity to be part of Aquaculture Congress.
